items.question: When does Propfolio launch?
items.answer: We're targeting Q2 2026. Waitlist members will get first access before we open to the public.

items.question: What does the 20% lifetime discount include?
items.answer: The first 100 people on the waitlist lock in 20% off all paid plans—forever. It applies automatically when you upgrade after launch.

items.question: How does the referral program work?
items.answer: After joining the waitlist, you'll receive a unique referral link via email. The 5 people who refer the most waitlist signups by launch day will receive 50% off for life.

items.question: What property types does Propfolio support?
items.answer: Short-term rentals, long-term residential leases, vacation properties, and commercial units. If you manage it, Propfolio can handle it.

items.question: Can I manage properties in multiple countries?
items.answer: Absolutely. Propfolio is built for multi-country portfolios with localized currency, language, and compliance support from day one.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. We follow industry-standard encryption and security practices to keep your data safe. More details will be available at launch.
